DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind randomized control trial seek find well treatment woman mixed urinary incontinence ( stress urgency incontinence ) . The primary aim determine whether midurethral sling surgery combine injection onabotulinumtoxinA ( Botox® ) detrusor muscle bladder improve symptom mixed urinary incontinence well sling surgery alone .
DOC.brief_title: The SLIM Study : Sling Botox® Injection Mixed Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Undergoing midurethral sling surgery Have symptom stress urgency urinary incontinence Able consent , fill study document , complete study procedure followup visit At least 18 year age English speaking Be able willing learn clean intermittent self catheterization technique History recurrent UTI ( define three culture prove UTIs within last 12 month ) Systemic neuromuscular disease know affect low urinary tract Undergoing concomitant prolapse surgery Previous incontinence surgery Treatment anticholinergic medication last 2 month Previous bladder injection onabotulinumtoxinA Prisoner Status Pregnancy
